page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN WOOLMER GREEN
page.content: {Redlands Aggregates}supply gravel and other materials for building roads and are the largest works in the area. Young school leavers are employed from the age of 16 . The workshops at{Lisles Garage}repair and maintain cars.The spraying room has been moved from the main garage to the one near the railway bridge.They also test vehicles on a rolling road. {Countryside Truck Hire}has a fleet of 130 trucks and they are hired out daily or weekly. There is a small{printers}in a building that is 70 years old and employs 12 people. {Weatherheads}is an agricultural engineering business which sells and maintains a variety of farming machinery including combine harvesters and tractors.
